import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-blog', templateUrl: './blog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./blog.component.css'] }) export class BlogComponent { }

Intelligent Business Travel

Meet the regions' top tier travel consultancy and travel provider

Recognition through Innovation

Mobile apps, contactless payments and IoT devices are just some of the technologies trending in the travel and tourism industry. Technology can change the way people travel, providing convenience, safety and fewer touchpoints.

A well rounded partner

A good travel companion should be organised enough to remember their passports, not lose their belongings and be able to get to the airport on time, to name a few. It's also a plus if they are not navigationally challenge and can read a map!
